metadata.title: CVE-2024-9781 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: AppleTalk and RELOAD Framing dissector crash in Wireshark 4.4.0 and 4.2.0to 4.2.7 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capturefile

criterions.comment: wireshark package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
